long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fight off mindless web browsing! 

This extension will convert your new tab pages into your GrowFrom home page. With it, you'll see your inspirational background and get seamless access to your goals and personal development tools as you browse the internet.
